forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low near 10C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 49F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 43F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
